name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Llamacation - Fun & Relax in Every New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LLamazing Fun, Inspiration and Relaxation in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say welcome to a handsome llama, pirate llama, and a secret one you will meet in the extension.

Handsome llama is a sweet little fellow and welcomes you with some gorgeous words.

Pirate llama on the other hand, yeah, he gives you some advice and inspiration, but with he's a pirate... you know what that means, don't ya? Don't expect him to behave all the time :-)

And then there is our sleepy head. He will remind you to take a short break and refreshed.

Enjoy a llamazing time!

tags: llama, fun, pet, new tab, momentum dash, tabbycat, tabby, alpaca, relaxation, relax, inner peace, color tab
